name: FROSE (BethKelly)
description:
Game Description

Frose is a voxal adventure game where you, as the titular princess, are on a mission to rescue the Prince from the hands of an evil Yeti and save his kingdom from an icy demise. You'll defeat frosty foes and arctic adversaries to save villagers who'll help you on your quest to free the prince - and prove that not all damsels have to be in distress.

Narrative

When Princess Frose happens upon a kingdom covered in ice, she can tell there's a chance for adventure. But with the Prince trapped in a castle and an entire village frozen in place, she realises it might just be her turn to be the hero.

Controls

W A S D - Move

Left Mouse Click - Attack

Move Mouse - Rotate Camera

Credits

Bethany Kelly - Design, 3D Assets & Textures

Stacey Satchell - Design, 3D Assets, Textures & Animation

A Sealey - Blueprints

All assets created using MagicaVoxel & Aseprite 

Gameplay Trailer Music - Winter Joy by Mixaud https://www.free-stock-music.com/mixaund-winter-joy.html
